alert.note: Alert for Erie; Huron; Ottawa; Sandusky; Seneca (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 26 at 4:23PM EDT until July 26 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Huron County in north central Ohio... Ottawa County in northwestern Ohio... Eastern Seneca County in northwestern Ohio... Erie County in north central Ohio... Eastern Sandusky County in northwestern Ohio... * Until 530 PM EDT. * At 422 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 15 miles northeast of Put-In-Bay to near Port Clinton to near Tiffin, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Sandusky, Tiffin, Norwalk, Western Vermilion, Port Clinton, Kelleys Island, Put-In-Bay, Bellevue, Clyde, Willard, New London, Plymouth, Green Springs, Northern Milan, Milan, Wakeman, Bloomville, Castalia, Catawba Island and Greenwich. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
